Class Atom

  • java.lang.Object
    • Atom
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Immutable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Atom>

    public class Atom
extends java.lang.Object
implements Immutable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Atom>
    Represents an atom. This class is immutable.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • transform

        public Atom transform(Rotation rot,
             Vector3D shift)
        Factory method to create a new Atom by transforming this one. The rotation is applied before the translation.
        Parameters:
        rot - a three-dimensional rotation.
        shift - a vector that we add to the position of this after it has been rotated.
